availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elizabeth Edwards Griffith (Lawrence County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Meredith Edwards and Susannah Caines Edwards. Married to James Griffith. Mother of Walter Griffith, James Griffith, Elsy Griffith, John Griffith, Elizabeth Griffith, Harrison Griffith, and Clarinda Griffith. Married to John Griffith in Lawrence County on December 19, 1862. Resident of Lawrence County in 1850. Resident of Lawrence County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p. 56B.
